item.goety.zpiglin_brute_servant_spawn_e: Zombified Piglin Brute Servant Spawn Egg
effect.goety.summon_down.description: Spells cost more Soul Energy to cast, higher levels increases cost. Newly summoned Mobs will gain Sapped and Weakness.
effect.goety.sapped.description: Increases damage taken by 20% per level.
effect.goety.gold_touched.description: Mobs drop gold nuggets on death, with amount increasing on higher levels.
effect.goety.illague.description: Periodically gives negative effects. Can be reduced by sleeping or drinking Milk.
effect.goety.burn_hex.description: Removes Fire Resistance from living entities. On Hard, fire damage doubles.
effect.goety.soul_hunger.description: Weakens movement, mining and attack speed and melee damage.
effect.goety.buff.description: Increases melee attack damage by 0.5 hearts per level.
effect.goety.rampage.description: Increases melee attack damage by 0.5 heart per level, Increases mining and attack speed. Spawns an explosion after gaining 5 levels.
effect.goety.climbing.description: Grants ability to climb up horizontal walls and move through Cobwebs.
effect.goety.busted.description: Reduces armor points by 50% per level.
effect.goety.soul_armor.description: Increases armor points by 2. Triples armor points if affected entities does not wear any armor.
effect.goety.pressure.description: Creepers will explode nigh-instantly towards targets with this effect.
effect.goety.charged.description: Level I gives 10% boost to speed and melee damage, Level II gives 25% boost to speed and reduction in melee damage. Gaining another Level will give damage.
effect.goety.ender_ground.description: Prevents teleportation unless it's by chat command.
effect.goety.freezing.description: Simulate being in powdered snow. Does nothing if immune to freezing.
effect.goety.nyctophobia.description: Periodically deals damage when in dark areas.
effect.goety.sun_allergy.description: Sets the affected entities on fire and damages helmet when in daylight.
effect.goety.snow_skin.description: Gives characteristics of Snow Golems to affected entities.
effect.goety.tripping.description: Causes the affected entities to be pushed in random direction periodically, higher levels makes it more frequent.
effect.goety.arrowmantic.description: Attract arrows towards the affected entities. Higher levels increases the radius.
effect.goety.sense_loss.description: Gives players blindness and causes mobs to have lower visibility range, with higher levels lowering it further.
effect.goety.flame_hands.description: Physical attacks sets entities aflame for 4 seconds with each level increasing the duration.
effect.goety.venomous_hands.description: Physical attacks gives Poison for 10 seconds with each level increasing the level.
effect.goety.repulsive.description: Knocks back attacking entity away; higher levels increases knockback distance.
effect.goety.explosive.description: Have a chance of unleashing an explosion when hurt; higher levels increases chance and explosion strength.
effect.goety.insight.description: Doubles the amount of experience points dropped; higher levels increases yield.
effect.goety.fire_trail.description: Walking sets the ground beneath on fire.
effect.goety.fiery_aura.description: Sets nearby entities on fire; higher levels increases range and burn duration.
effect.goety.frosty_aura.description: Gives nearby entities Freezing; higher levels increases range and Freezing level.
effect.goety.plunge.description: Causes flying or swimming affected entities to drop towards the ground.
effect.goety.photosynthesis.description: Regenerates health when in sunlight; higher levels make health regenerate quicker.
effect.goety.flammable.description: Affected entities take more damage from fire; does not effect fire resistant entities.
effect.goety.save_effects.description: Effects persists after affected player's death. Does nothing if player is in hardcore.
effect.goety.wild_rage.description: Affected entities will target and attack any nearby attackable entities.
enchantment.goety.soul_eater.desc: Increases the amount of Soul Energy gained after killing a mob.
enchantment.goety.wanting.desc: Mobs will drop more loot when killed via Summoned Creatures/Spells.
enchantment.goety.burning.desc: Makes Spells burn mobs or increase duration of fire.
enchantment.goety.absorb.desc: Causes the player to heal when Spells damages mob.
info.goety.items.dark_scroll.desc: Must be used within a Woodland Mansion.
info.goety.items.dark_scroll.failure: You are not within a Woodland Mansion!
info.goety.items.warred: The template for ancient war machines.
info.goety.items.buried: Some sort of ancient manuscript of a nameless kingdom...
info.goety.items.front: A repurposed spell of a nameless king...
info.goety.research.ravaging: You have learned the method of creating Ravagers!
info.goety.research.warred: You have learned the method of making Redstone Golems!
info.goety.research.buried: You have learned the nameless paths of Necromancy!
info.goety.research.haunting: You have learned the method of possessing Armors!
info.goety.research.front: You have learned the method of summoning Vanguards!
info.goety.research.lich: You have learned the secret to Immortality!
info.goety.ritual.fail: You do not know how to properly start this ritual!
info.goety.ritual.tooManyItems.fail: Too many Items on Pedestals within Vicinity!
info.goety.ritual.wrongItems.fail: Certain Items aren't part of the Requirements!
info.goety.ritual.apostleWarn: ¬ß4Warning: You're about to face a foe within their own domain. Are you prepared?¬ß4
info.goety.grimoire.emptyTypes: No Grudge against any Entity Type
info.goety.lichdom.success: You have ascended your mortal coil!
info.goety.lichdom.fail: You didn't prepare yourself properly to drink the potion!
info.goety.apostle.summon: A dark presence washes over you...
tooltip.goety.arca_not_bound: Has yet to be bound to an Arca.
commands.goety.soul.set.points.invalid: Error for Soul Energy setting points
commands.goety.illager.spawn.failure: %s doesn't have enough Soul Energy for Illagers to spawn
commands.goety.research.remove.failure: %s already does not have the research!
advancements.goety.root.title: The Dark Arts
advancements.goety.craft_totem_roots.des: Craft a Totem of Roots, which can be used to craft basic components.
advancements.goety.craft_infuser.title: Cursed Elements
advancements.goety.craft_infuser.descrip: Put it on a Spawner to make it work.
advancements.goety.craft_magic_emerald.d: Looks like there's something more to Emeralds than previously thought...
advancements.goety.craft_totem.title: Make Your Own
advancements.goety.craft_cursed_ingot.de: Seems to be what Spawners are made of.
advancements.goety.craft_empty_focus.des: Maybe make a Wand first before anything else.
advancements.goety.craft_dark_wand.title: Oh, the Pointing Again.
advancements.goety.craft_dark_robe.title: Look at Me, I'm the Evoker Now
advancements.goety.craft_dark_robe.descr: Dark Hats reduces Casting Time, Dark Robes reduces Soul Costs.
advancements.goety.craft_vexing_focus.de: Look out for any Hermits outside of your windows.
advancements.goety.craft_biting_focus.de: Perhaps it can be improved later on...
advancements.goety.craft_all_focus.title: Hyperfocus
advancements.goety.craft_dark_altar.desc: Place the Dark Altar onto a Cursed Cage with a Totem of Souls in it.
advancements.goety.craft_necro_brazier.d: Needs to be placed within the Deep Dark, on top of a Cursed Cage with Totem or Transfer Gem.
advancements.goety.craft_dark_scythe.des: Grants Soul Energy with each hit. Attack Speed increases if not holding anything offhand.
advancements.goety.craft_star_amulet.des: Protects wearer from arrows when under half the max health.
advancements.goety.craft_ring_of_want.de: Increases Loot Drop from Mobs when killed using Spells or Summons. Must be enchanted first.
advancements.goety.craft_sculk_converter: Absorbs Soul Energy, from the Cursed Cage above it, to grow Sculk around itself.
advancements.goety.craft_sculk_grower.de: Absorbs a certain amount of Soul Energy to grow surrounding crops.
advancements.goety.craft_arca.title: Remote Connection
advancements.goety.craft_arca.descriptio: The Arca stores and distributes your Soul Energy without a need of a Totem of Souls.
advancements.goety.craft_witch_hat.title: We've Found a Witch!
advancements.goety.craft_witch_hat.descr: Craft or find a Witches Hat, which gives a chance of not consuming a Potion.
advancements.goety.craft_witch_robe.desc: Witches Robes gives 85% magic protection and portable brewing. Wearing both Robe and Hat makes Witches neutral.
advancements.goety.craft_necro_set.title: Really Late Healer
advancements.goety.craft_necro_set.descr: Wearing Necro Crown and Cape causes none boss Undead to be Neutral. Necro Staff powers Necromantic Spells.
advancements.goety.craft_illusion_robe.d: Improves Invisibility effect and Mirror Spells.
advancements.goety.craft_wind_robe.title: It Wimdy
advancements.goety.craft_wind_robe.descr: Wind Robes slows down descent and gives discount to Wind Spells.
advancements.goety.craft_all_robes.title: Fancy Wardrobe
advancements.goety.kill_envioker.title: Angry Video Game Illager
advancements.goety.kill_envioker.descrip: Looks like you've gathered some attention from those Illagers...
advancements.goety.kill_illagers.title: Expected The Unexpected
advancements.goety.kill_illagers.descrip: Defeated an Envioker, an Inquillager and a Conquillager.
advancements.goety.find_crypt.title: Pretty Creepy
advancements.goety.find_crypt.descriptio: Find your way into the Crypts.
advancements.goety.kill_skull_lord.title: Skull Basher
advancements.goety.kill_skull_lord.descr: Defeated a Skull Lord, the ancient lord of the Crypt.
advancements.goety.kill_crone.title: It's a Fair Cop
advancements.goety.kill_crone.descriptio: Defeated a Crone, the old brewer of the bogs.
advancements.goety.kill_apostle.title: Trumpeter's Shadow
advancements.goety.kill_apostle.descript: Defeated an Apostle, the pale faced envoy of the Nether.
advancements.goety.craft_philosophers_ma: Can break almost any block and causes Mobs to drop Gold Nuggets.
advancements.goety.craft_death_scythe.de: At full power, can let loose a projectile that slashes everything in its vicinity.
advancements.goety.kill_minister.title: Cornelia Fudged
advancements.goety.kill_minister.descrip: Defeated a Minister, the greedy and charismatic Illager chief.
advancements.goety.kill_vizier.title: Arubian Nights
advancements.goety.kill_vizier.descripti: Defeated a Vizier, royal official of the Illagers.
advancements.goety.ravaging_scroll.title: Ravage And Savage
advancements.goety.ravaging_scroll.descr: Read the Ravaging Scroll and discover the way of Ravaging.
advancements.goety.warred_scroll.title: Some Mumbo Jumbo
advancements.goety.warred_scroll.descrip: Read the Warred Scroll and discover the way of war.
advancements.goety.haunting_scroll.title: All Is Dust
advancements.goety.haunting_scroll.descr: Read the Haunting Scroll and discover the way of haunting.
advancements.goety.unlock_necromancer.de: Discover the secrets of making Necromancers.
advancements.goety.front_scroll.title: To Sow Dragon's Teeth
advancements.goety.front_scroll.descript: Read the Front Scroll and discover the way of leading fronts.
advancements.goety.forbidden_scroll.desc: Read the Forbidden Scroll and discover the secrets of Immortality.
advancements.goety.summon_redstone_golem: Summon a Redstone Golem with an Animation Core.
advancements.goety.become_lich.title: I am Beyond Strength
advancements.goety.become_lich.descripti: Ascend to Lichdom and become truly immortal!
item.goety.jei_dummy.sacrifice.tooltip: This ritual requires a sacrifice to start.
item.goety.jei_dummy.item.tooltip: This ritual requires to use a specific item to start.
item.goety.jei_dummy.none.tooltip: This ritual does not create any items.
